answers.author: Responder 1

answers.answer: The route handler is responsible for loading model data.
answers.author: Responder 2

answers.answer: The route handler is the only part of an Ember application that can access model data. We can display model information in a template, but that template's route handler must retrieve it for the template.
answers.author: Responder 3
